backend/main.mo: Main actor defining types (Subject, Question with mcqOneMark category, GeneratedPaper with 5 variants) and functions for managing subjects, questions (single and bulk add), and querying questions by subject/category, with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that converts old question category #mcq to new #mcqOneMark category while preserving all other question data and actor state during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: MCQ marking scheme update to 1 mark, paper preview display fix, and success popup notifications for bulk upload and paper generation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages (Login, Dashboard, AddQuestion with bulk upload success toast, QuestionBank, GeneratePaper with success notification and auto-navigation, PaperPreview), components (Layout, QuestionCard with 1 Mark label, PaperSection), hooks (useQueries with refactored getQuestions), and utilities (pdfGenerator with 1 mark MCQ labeling).
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication, protected routes for all pages (Dashboard, AddQuestion, QuestionBank, GeneratePaper, PaperPreview, GeneratedPapers), and loading state during initialization.
frontend/src/components/EditQuestionModa: Modal dialog component for editing questions, currently showing placeholder message that editing functionality will be available in future update.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout with fixed navy sidebar containing navigation menu items (Dashboard, Add Questions, Question Bank, Generate Paper, Generated Papers) with active state highlighting, logout button, and main content area with Outlet.
frontend/src/components/PaperCard.tsx: Displays a card for an exam paper with subject name, creation date, duration, total marks, and a button to navigate to the paper preview page.
frontend/src/components/PaperSection.tsx: Renders a section of exam questions with a title, displaying each question with numbering and MCQ options if applicable.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a question card with category badge, difficulty level, question text, MCQ options with correct answer indicator, and edit/delete action buttons.
frontend/src/components/StatsCard.tsx: A simple statistics card component that displays a title, count number, and icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SubjectManager.t: Manages subjects with a form to add new subjects (ID, name, code) and displays a list of existing subjects with edit/delete actions.
Displays a visual workflow diagram showing the system stages from Subjects through Question Categories, Stored Questions, Paper Generation Engine, to PDF Output.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations including subjects, questions, bulk uploads, and generated papers with localStorage fallback for subjects.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Poppins and Inter), configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for a navy blue and light blue color scheme with dark mode support. Includes utility classes for navy/light-blue colors and custom shadow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AddQuestion.tsx: Page component for adding questions individually via form or bulk uploading via CSV/JSON files. Handles question validation, MCQ options, difficulty levels, and provides CSV template download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying welcome message with principal ID, statistics cards for subjects/questions/papers count, and a workflow diagram component.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratedPapers.tsx: Page that displays a grid of previously generated question papers retrieved from localStorage, sorted by creation date with newest first.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePaper.tsx: Page for generating question papers by selecting subject, exam duration, total marks, and question counts per category. Fetches questions from backend, validates availability, randomly selects and shuffles questions to create 5 variants (A-E), then saves to localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with college logo and Internet Identity authentication button. Redirects to dashboard upon successful login.
frontend/src/pages/PaperPreview.tsx: Page for previewing generated question papers with tabs for switching between variants (A-E). Organizes questions into sections (A/B/C) by category and provides PDF download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx: React page component that displays and manages questions organized by category and subject, with tabs for questions and subjects, filtering capabilities, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/utils/csvParser.ts: Parses CSV files containing question data, validates headers and fields, converts string values to appropriate enums (QuestionCategory, DifficultyLevel), and returns valid questions with error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/csvTemplate.ts: Provides a function to download a CSV template file with sample question data showing the expected format for bulk question imports.
frontend/src/utils/docxParser.ts: Empty file placeholder for DOCX parsing functionality.
frontend/src/utils/docxTemplate.ts: Empty file placeholder for DOCX template functionality.
frontend/src/utils/jsonParser.ts: Parses JSON arrays of question objects, validates required fields and enum values (category, difficulty), and returns validated questions with detailed error reporting per array index.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates printable PDF exam papers by creating an HTML document with formatted sections (A, B, C), questions, and MCQ options, then opens it in a new window for printing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (including OKLCH color space), fonts (Poppins, Inter), spacing, shadows, animations, and theme extensions for the application.
project_state.json: Project state file defining an Automatic Question Paper Generation System for teachers with features for managing question banks, bulk uploads, and PDF generation. Contains architectural notes (navy blue theme, database connectivity, MCQ/marks categorization), known issues (bulk upload questions not displaying, slow paper generation, missing confirmation popups), and a comprehensive list of existing features covering authentication, dashboard, question management, and paper generation workflows.
